main.name: Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror

notes.text: The first deck I got KOG with in May. Basically just restarting for a way to get emperor out. Invader coming in clutch often too though. (Konami still have to fix the quickplay glitch for when you have IOD on the field and opponent has a blocked quickplay face down)
